artist: Author: John Rodgers Jewitt; Engraver: J. T. Porter; Printer: Loomis & Richards, Middletown, Connecticut; Publisher: Loomis & Richards, Middletown, Connecticut
description: binding: brown leather; endpapers: front: engraving tipped in: back: cream wove paper; 203 pp., 2 engravings

provenance: Robert H. Luck, New York; given to MIA, 1988.
title: A Narrative of the Adventures and Sufferings of John R. Jewitt
